title: FS - Prices Reduced: T205 HOF and Commons
author: Kris19

posts.post_title: FS - Prices Reduced: T205 HOF and Commons
posts.post_content:
These are from a scrapbook rescue project. I soaked the cards in distilled water ONLY to remove them from the pages and dried them between non-bleached paper towels. As you can see in the scans, there are glue stains on most and paper loss on some.

Shipping is $4, unless you spend $100 total, then it is free.  Prices are net to me, with PayPal preferred.

Please email me at [url]kris.sweckard@sbcglobal.net[/url] to purchase or with any questions. Thanks!
